newsitem.title: CANADA: SR Telecom sees C$50 mln of new orders.
newsitem.headline: SR Telecom sees C$50 mln of new orders.

text.p: SR Telecom Inc said on Wednesday that it expects C$50 million of new orders over the next three years from Korea Telecom.
The orders would be for the company's SR500-s, a TDMA microwave wireless product for the provision of telehone service, replacing existing SR-100s being used by Korea Telecom, SR Telecom said.

The new SR500-s systems would be used to provide telephone service to the hundreds of islands around the western and southern coasts of Korea. The systems offer greatly increased subscriber capacity and highest quality digital telephone and data service.
